The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 14 July is 48,971 (5,668.1 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 09 July, there were 2,348 new confirmed cases (271.8 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 02 July, there were 1,430 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 64% (918 extra cases).
